args: With the Dragonyule celebration in full swing,\nCleo and Notte head for the venue with\ntheir freshly baked cake in tow.
You're finally happy with it, eh?
I am. I came up with a way to make a cake\nthat everyone could enjoy together.
And now for the grand debut...
Hot jumpin' weasels! I think my drool\norgan just kicked into overdrive!
Hold a moment. Are those sugar cookies...\nshaped like us?
Yes. I made them myself, so I apologize\nthat they're a bit...misshapen.
Stop that at once. They're perfect.\nWhy, they look exactly like us!
Ah! Just look at His Highness's round\nlittle eyes! They're so c-c-cuuuuu...
Well, I'm delighted you like them.
Enough chatter—let's eat already!\nMy stomach can't take no more!
Yes, by all means—and please don't be\nshy about giving me your opinions.
Ooo, this fluffy texture is amazing.\nIt simply melts in my mouth.
It's a classic flavor—not too sweet.\nMakes me feel like I could eat the stuff\ntill I burst!
Don't you always do that, Ranzal?
Bwaa ha ha! I sure do!
Still, yer one to talk. How many of those\nberries ya gonna cram down yer gullet?
Hee hee! You got me there.
It looks like everyone's enjoying it.
That makes it worth all the effort.
But that's enough feasting with your eyes.\nIt's time to have a bite.
And yet not the same as your mother's,\nI am well aware.
Actually, this is even closer than the\nlast one you had me try.
The taste is different, of course,\nbut it's filling me with a warm feeling.
Mom always filled her cake with love,\nand you've nailed that with this one.
Here, Cleo. Have some with me.
If you don't grab a slice now,\nit's all going to be gone.
After the Dragonyule party has ended...
Why did you summon me here?
Because I want you to have this.
Just a little Dragonyule gift from me.
Oh! Um, thank you. But you didn't need\nto do this for me.
Of course I did; you toiled away for ages\ntrying to make that cake, after all.
And that made me want to get you\na little something in return.
It wouldn't be much of a present\nif you couldn't.
With a model of the Halidom inside.
Ah! When I shake it, snow falls over the\ncastle! It's so beautiful...

You strike me as someone who
would appreciate the aesthetic
serenity of a snow globe, so I
had the village tinker make one.
I'm sorry. Did I do something wrong?
*sniff* No, you foolish man.\nI'm simply beside myself with joy.
To think you went to such lengths to do\nsomething like this for me.
It pales in comparison to all the hard work\nyou put in.
And I'm not just talking about the cake.
You manage the entire household for\neveryone! That's a huge undertaking.
I'll always be grateful to you for that.
Just hearing those words from you is\nreward enough.
And yet, I have to thank you as well.
You've given me a wonderful group of\npeople to celebrate Dragonyule with.
Without you, I would likely still be all\nalone in that forest.
I'm glad you've been able to meet\nsome new friends, Cleo.
Dragonyule is a celebration to be spent\nwith the people who matter most.
And from the very depths of my heart,\nI am grateful to spend the day with you.
I hope to do so again next year.
Then shall we wish for that upon the\nYuletree? That IS a tradition, yes?
And so, the prince and Cleo closed their eyes\nand made a Yuletree wish...
